description: A high privileged user who has access to transaction SM59 can read connection details stored with the destination for http calls in SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP and ABAP Platform - versions 700, 701, 702, 710, 711, 730, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756.
